Alastria Core Platform

The infrastructure that powers the Alastria Blockchain Network

Alastria Platform information

  1. PLATFORM REQUIREMENTS: requirements for a country blockchain network
  2. REFERENCE ARCHITECTURE: to help discussions around network items
  3. ALASTRIA QUORUM NODES: how to install and connect Validator and Regular nodes to ALastria Testnet
  4. ALASTRIA NODE MONITORING: tools for implementing a Decentralized Governance Model
  5. Roadmap: The roadmap for the core platform

Alastria Core Platform maintained by alastria
